name: Skellies Ain't Scary
description:
Skellies Ain't Scary is a bullet hell rogue-like with minimalist graphics. Delve into deep dungeons and collect a plethora of guns and items. Build the strongest synergies and beat all the bosses. Pests and foes lie deep within, eager to stop you in your tracks as you venture past floor after floor of increasingly mortal challenges. Uncover the secrets of the dungeon and collect the lost treasures that await you.


FAST PACED GAMEPLAY

Unlimited ammo and one second reloads beg you to sweep the dungeons at lightning speeds. Enemies swarm you in droves, while you bob and weave manically to avoid their chaotic sprays of bullets.


WEAPON AND ITEM VARIETY

The dungeon floors boast a remarkable amount of unique items with special abilities and varied gun play. Double item slots allow for fun, game breaking combos, and with a range of 50+ items and 25+ guns, the possibilities are far and wide.


HUB WORLD

A spacious hub world containing trophies of your achievements and unlockable equipment that can affect future runs.
